title: (32619) Monterrei - Rúa do Castelo

title: (32619) Monterrei - 22 Lugar Monterrei

title: (32617) A Veiga das Meás - 27 Lugar Veiga Meas
title_short: (32617) A Veiga das Meás - 27 Lugar Veiga Meas
description: Starting point of the route Pozo do Demo hiking, where we can see its waterfall. Before the Pozo do Demo gorge, panoramic views of the Monterrei Valley with a table and benches. The route descends to the town of Cabreiroá at the height of Verín. Parking slightly inclined. Pretty village, with a stone cross at the bottom of the town. Source 200 meters down town. Attention, leave the Rías Baixas highway at exit 155, otherwise when you reach the village of Osoño you will have to turn around.

title: (32618) Albarellos - 2A Rúa Fontiñas
description: Without any service, but ample parking with no problem of length or height. Side tables to eat. It is parking of some summer swimming pools are very good and at a very good price. We stopped for one night, the next day we used the pools and everything without a problem. Of course, little else to see in the town, small but beautiful.

title: (32611) Riós - N-525
description: Ideal place for a meal, very quiet, ideal for a break during a long journey

title: (32689) Cualedro - 173 Autovía de las Rías Bajas
title_short: (32689) Cualedro - 173 Autovía de las Rías Bajas

title: (32621) Laza - OU-113

title: (32697) Verín - 97 N-532

title: (32620) Laza - 4 Rúa dos Zapateiros

Mateus" cafe, the area is pleasant, calm and relaxing with 2 water points. However, you must choose its location to be level. No dedicated motorhome service, but optimal satellite and 4G reception. Secure wifi network at the cafe with the code 8dm8723r

title: (32688) A Xironda -

title: (5400) Chaves - 39 Avenida Trindade

LIDL parking area for motorhome.

title: (5400-632) Faiões - 42 Estrada Nacional

It is fit for motorhomes.

title: (5400) Chaves - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares

title: (5400-569) Chaves -

Laundry service.

title: (32540) A Gudiña -

It is recommended for vans or campers since to get there there is a small narrow bridge that you have to cross. At night there is no light, nor any type of service. Recommended to spend an afternoon or a night.

title: (5335) - N103
description: Road N103, 61km West Bragenza, nice, flat, top hill, short unpaved road, place with 360° free view, very quiet.

title: (5470) Montalegre - Rua Antȯnio José Almeida
description: Roadside parking, convenient for town centre. No problem overnight. No services.

title: (32549) A Mezquita - Estrada Mezquita - Vilavella

title: (5470-323) Negrões - 1 Rua Cemitério

title: (5430) - Unnamed Road
description: Visited site May 2022. A slightly odd and eerie place. Satnav took us up a very steep unmade road. At the top we found a disused and vandalised toilet block, some very old children’s play equipment and a view. No water. We didn’t stay. We left by a made up road, poor condition, past the old church which, if we had found first, we might have stayed but earlier experience put us off.

title: (5460) - 55 R311
description: A flat location, ideal for spending a night alone and green. starting point for a nice family stroll in a bucolic place. No service but it is not the goal.

title: (5470-323) Negrões - 3 Rua Corga da Cruz

title: (32549) A Vilavella - N-525

title: () Moimenta - Lgo do Toural

name: Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
title: (5320) Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
title_short: (5320) Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
description: Biological Park of Vinhais. Payment possible by credit card. Gray water drain. Drain black waters. Reloading in water. Shower. Toilet. Electricity. Washing done by the staff (ask the reception). Activities: Playground for children, Swimming (natural swimming pool), hiking (starting from two paths), tree climbing, zipline, climbing, visit of the park, paintball.

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: Flat, with a little shade in the center of town. Calm and peaceful. ASA for AC at 300 meters.

title: (5430) - R206
description: Picnic area overlooking a busy road during the day. We stayed for the night. No noise.

title: (5430-424) Valpaços -
description: Service area on Intermarché car park, gray water drainage, black water. Filling clean water. Clean. Next to the city restaurant on small place Tasquinha do pinheiro good and Portuguese price.

title: (32701) Banos de Molgas - 47 Lugar Baños de Molgas
title_short: (32701) Banos de Molgas - 47 Lugar Baños de Molgas
description: Wide esplanade to spend the night. Quiet area next to the old train station, now converted into a hostel and with a cafeteria open in spring, summer and fall. Easy access

title: (5320) - Unnamed Road
description: Site by the lake in a nature park. Nice terrain!

title: (32667) Paciños -
description: Quiet parking, visit to the Ecoespazo o Rexo, walks along the river

title: () - EM520
description: This is a awesome place on the top of the mountain range with a great view to the dam. There are no services, just nature. There are paths till here but the access is a little difficult for bigger vans I think, because there’s not much space to turn around. We stayed for one night, it was pitch black because there’s no light around but super calm and we felt secure. I don’t recommend it in windy days because here on top you really feel it in your motor home. But the views during the day are just breathless!

title: () Valpaços - 17 Rua 13 do Bairro 1º de Maio
title_short: () Valpaços - 17 Rua 13 do Bairro 1º de Maio
description: Lots of room next to a gymnasium, calm and friendly during my visit, I did not test at night but it seems possible because no interdict, nearby Intermarché, no service.

title: (5320) Vinhais -
description: Nice place behind the church. Overlooking the town. Quiet place, at least today :)

title: (5430) Valpaços - 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta
title_short: (5430) Valpaços - 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta
description: Residential area near the exposition center of Valpaços. Near Supermarket Pingo Doce.

address.street: 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta

title: (5445) -
description: Parking lot of '' Altar de sacrifícios, '' in Argeriz. large lot on flat grass or almost with large trees and picnic tables and bins and another open area ... all with a beautiful view of the valley

title: (32786) A Pobra de Trives - 20 Cabeza de Manzaneda
title_short: (32786) A Pobra de Trives - 20 Cabeza de Manzaneda
description: Parking at the ski station of Manzaneda, free and you can spend the night. In the area there are restaurants, heated pool, spa, ...

title: (32880) Muíños - OU-302
description: Small stop for picnic in full autonomy on the side of the road but separated by a rock, seen beautiful, few passages.

title: () - EM514
description: Quiet near a small dam, barbecue and water point available. Attention, water point (no water) out of season.

title: (32701) - 66 Lugar Alvite
description: It is in a parking lot of a closed Sports Center. 10 minutes from the town on foot. Easy access to services. We discovered it in passing.

title: (5320-070) Vinhais - Unnamed Road
description: Viewpoint next to Moimenta, a little path not suitable for motorhomes / bus. Flat place between granites, very quiet.

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: For lunch break or more, no prohibition sign, beautiful view, too bad, not very clean

title: (5470-083) São Pedro - 2 EM514
description: Picnic with easier access. Water and barbecue. Quiet night!

title: (5470) Antigo -
description:
Boat launch path on the lake. Away from the main road. Dirt and pebble path easy to access for a van not easy for a CC to see.
Alone in the world at the water's edge the bells of the sheep and the waves for only noises. No services.

title: (5470) Antigo -
description:
A truly rejuvenating and idyllic place. Quiet and beautiful.
Very passable dirt road for a van.
Very windy in July, we were very very cold despite our sweaters.

title: (32660) Allariz - 57 Rúa Emilia Pardo Bazán
description: Parking area and prepared for high intensity rains. With nearby establishments to be able to stay a few days and stock up. Wide area for parking of vehicles in general and motorhomes.

title: () - 77 EM520
description: Spectacular and calm place, surrounded by nature. You can park in various locations with various views.

title: (32660) Allariz - 55 Rúa Emilia Pardo Bazán
description: Laundry

title: (32880) Muíños - OU-302
description: Magnificent view for a little break.

title: (32660) Allariz - 15 Rúa Campo da Barreira
description: Large ground parking in the center of the village. Perfect to visit. Several bars and shops close by. Very quiet at night. In the morning bells ring. No services. On Saturdays it is closed by market.

title: (49580) Pias - 7 Carretera Porto
description: Quiet place for day and overnight. Nice views of the valley of the Boney rivers. And Barjacova without services very quiet site, good hiking areas

title: (5470) Viade de Baixo - Unnamed Road
description: Short stretch of rocky road to get there, but possible with big vans. Quiet place, all by yourself. Would definitely recommend!

title: (32660) Allariz - 17B Estrada de Xunqueira
description: Parking access to the river bathing area.

title: (49573) Lubián - ZA-106
description: Quiet place to stop undisturbed. Views over the ports of Padornelo and La Canda. Fountain with water all year round. Cross with the Camino de Santiago. I haven't slept, but I guess it can be done without problems. A few kilometers away there are towns with bars, such as Lubian, through which they will have trouble passing very long vehicles. The road from the Zamorano side is sloping, winding and narrow, with a lot of potholes, and some trucks from the AVE works circulate along it. Access from the Galician side does not offer difficulties.

title: (32655) Rairiz de Veiga - Estrada de Xinzo
title_short: (32655) Rairiz de Veiga - Estrada de Xinzo
description: Big place with tables, benches and drinking water... Drive-in is possible without any problems. Located on a normal traffic road

title: (32700) Maceda - 2 Rúa do Toural
description: Parking without services, with a fountain and containers. Close to the Ribeira Sacra (30 mins) and 5 mins walk from a medieval castle

title: (32700) Maceda - 12 Rúa do Cemiterio
description: It is a field with a lot of space to park, there is no height limitation or signs that it is forbidden to spend the night. Plenty of room to play with the kids or the dogs. There is a shaded picnic area.

title: (32703) Maceda - 1 Camino das Searas
description: Flat pitch for around 20 motorhomes, super quiet to spend the night, and visit the town of Maceda. 1 water tap without thread.

title: (32660) Allariz - 30 Rúa Portovello
description:
This place is no longer a simple car park but a motorhome area with all the services, without electricity.
Free parking.
Earth floor with a very slight slope. No shade.
10 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (32665) Allariz - 31 Rúa o Seixo
description: Parking area next to the municipal soccer field of Allariz. There is another more central area, but it has more complicated access. This area is a 10 minute walk away and is absolutely quiet and recommended. Without services

title: (32660) Allariz - Camiño de Arnado
description: Parking in front of the river. Walk to the Allariz Center. With a shadow.

title: (5385) Torre de Dona Chama - 98 Rua São Brás
title_short: (5385) Torre de Dona Chama - 98 Rua São Brás
description: Place in front of the chapel Castro Sao Brãs. Grand view at almost 180 degrees. Access only small van (max 6m) or 4x4 motorhome.

title: (5445) Carrezedo de Montenegro - 28 R206
description: Picnic area in a new activity zone. 5 tables, games for children, city stadium, possible to spend the night, slightly sloping. For the moment lacks shade.

name: Camping Os Invernadeiros
title: (32665) Camping Os Invernadeiros
description: Camping Os Invernadeiros

title: (5445) Padrela e Tazém - 6 Rua Er 206
description: Simple, practically level parking lot located by the roadside illuminated at night with some shade. 2 picnic tables. Large enough to accept several large motorhomes. A fountain with a tap and standard screw allows filling with water. No emptying service.

title: (5470-526) Montalegre - 6 Rua Santo António
description: Parking lot for a community soccer pitch. Wide open and flat. Good for around 4 motorhomes. Easy access. Wake up to the roosters!

title: (32708) Maceda - OU-536
description: Picnic area with tables and spectacular panoramic views

title: (32703) Francos - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area parking next to a river walk. Some not flat area. Little shade in the parking area. Very calm.

title: (32814) San Pedro -
description: Totally secluded place without any service. Incredible sunset as well as panoramic views of the area

title: (5385) - EM206-1
description: Parking of the small chapel. Entry by the small dirt road. Several grassy places but expect wedges or flat concrete platform. Water behind the chapel. In trouble because nothing exceptional but close to the city about 1.5 km with all shops.

title: (32740) O Rodicio -
description: Small roadside picnic area with a fountain to fill up with tasty drinking water.

title: (32556) Viana do Bolo - Unnamed Road
description: Small natural location at the top of the mountain, at the foot of an antenna. Far from everything, perfect night. Be careful however, the road leading there is well paved and maintained but it is also very narrow with a difficult U-turn at the top. Rather reserved for small motorhomes therefore.

title: (32668) Augas Santas -
description: Great place to park for the day. From there starts a small route of the most interesting. It is also worth paying a visit to the town if the route is not followed. It has its history.

title: (32748) A Edrada -
description: Excellent place to spend the night and spend the day meters from the river. AC not suitable, only vans since the road (barely 15 meters) is very narrow and not in very good condition. Access is right where the "Bon Voyage" sign is.

title: (5370) - 39 Rua Gricha
description: Quiet place, good place surrounded by nature. near a small village and nice people. Staying overnight is better when you talk to the chef of the bar (Bar do Miguel). We were here today, but have no way of driving to the place because our camper with a trailer is too big... We were right in front of the bridge to the site

title: (32748) Castiñeiras - Unnamed Road
description: Pleasant place with a van but access is good for cars, vans etc... very quiet, cement tables and benches in the shade. nice place where you can swim quietly ..

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 13 EM549
description: Parking place in Pedras Salgadas. Close to a road but quiet at night. Next to tables and water. Also nice to visit the urban park, spa and drink natural sparkling water from a spring fountain. Equestrian center near by.

title: (32112) Orense - 10 OU-101
description: Good place to spend the night. Parking next to the Paderne de Allariz Town Hall. Several hiking trails start from here. The drawback is that the road is close, but at night there is little traffic and it is not completely flat. There is a pharmacy nearby as well as a bar.

title: (5450) - 12 Avenida Lopes Oliveira
description: Quiet place to spend the night, without services, next to the Centro de Saúde. Not recommended for vehicles over 7 meters. It is worth to visit the thermal park and the gardens of seus.

title: (32748) Verengo - RIBEIRA SACRA
description: Drinking water source. Garbage bins next to it.

title: (32375) O Bolo - OU-0751
description: Recreational area of As Ermitas. Charming and quiet car park to spend the night or spend the day. It is located next to the Bibei River and is equipped with tables, benches, trash cans and a river beach. At 200m the spectacular sanctuary of As Ermitas S.XVII. Possibility of hiking.

title: (32748) Forcas - 30 Lugar Forcas
description: Day and night parking area, very quiet town. No services. Parking area for routes.

title: (32789) A Pobra de Trives - OU-536
description: Nice place by the river, picnic tables, overnight possible in peace and quiet. Access by a small road a bit impressive at first but easy after, even for 7-8 meters. No service.

title: (32720) O Regueiro -
description: Recommendable. It is easily reached as the road is paved

title: (32769) Castro Caldelas - OU-536
description: Wonderful place by the river. pool and world restaurant! Space for about 10 vans. Dogs prohibited.

name: Camping A Masía
title: (32780) Camping A Masía
description: Simple campsite along the road outside A Pobra de Trevis. Owner friendly and helpful. Facilities clean and decent for the size of campsite. Not somewhere i would stay for an extended period but good for a stopover.

title: (32748) Parada de Sil - Unnamed Road
description: 180 ° viewpoint with sunset and spectacular views

title: (32765) La Teijeira - OU-0652
description:
Small picnic area, with a spring of sulfurous waters
Space for 2 vans. Road with hardly any traffic. We spent a quiet night next to the stream. Very small entrance steep for AC.
